text: Goofy Gymnastics is a Goofy cartoon produced by Walt Disney Productions and released by RKO Radio Pictures on September 23, 1949. ==Voice cast== * Goofy: Pinto Colvig * Off-screen man: Billy Bletcher * Narrator: John McLeish ==Home media== The short was released on December 2, 2002, on Walt Disney Treasures: The Complete Goofy and on the "Walt Disney's Classic Cartoon Favorites Extreme Sports Fun" Volume 5. ==References== ==More information== *Disney Shorts Information * Category:Goofy Category:Sports movies Category:Short movies
title: Goofy Gymnastics
